lead_paragraph: While the cuts are projected to save taxpayers more than $20 billion by 2025, critics fear that they could leave the state open to financial pitfalls.

headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Tax Cuts, Boon for Middle Class, Come With Risk
headline.main: Cuomo’s Tax Cuts, Boon for Middle Class, Come With Risk

snippet: While the cuts are projected to save taxpayers more than $20 billion by 2025, critics fear that they could leave the state open to financial pitfalls.
abstract: Some New York State budget officials and government oversight advocacy groups are sounding warning bell over Gov Andrew Cuomo's March 31 announcement of phased cuts to personal income taxes for about five million wealthy New Yorkers; critics warn that plan, first phase of which will go into effect in 2018, could deprive state's coffers of some $20 billion by 2025.
